option.name: notice
option.value: Copyright (c) $today.year. Copying and distributing any part of or this entire software is forbidden unless otherwise authorised by the authors and upon negotiations formally recorded and signed. However, if this software should be downloaded from third party site/location, user should ditribute alongside this copyright note. Modifications to the source however is closed source and can only be done upon a request sent to the project lead. Sanctions apply where users go against the rules mentioned here or implied by this copyright note.
